identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

rules: Use tight tracking (tracking-tight) for all headings over 24px.
Use relaxed leading (leading-relaxed) for all body text to improve readability.

usage.primary: Use ONLY for primary actions (Save, Create, Ask AI).
usage.accent: Use Electric Indigo for AI-related elements (Summarize, Search).
usage.background: Avoid pure white (#FFFFFF) for the main background. Use the off-white/warm-black defined above.
usage.gradients: Do NOT use full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients only for the 'Ask AI' modal background.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 where p-4 is standard.

grid_strategies.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Dense but organized.
grid_strategies.landing: Tetris Grid: Asymmetrical bento grid for features. Mix wide (col-span-2) and tall (row-span-2) cards.

inputs.style: rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring

ai_panel.style: glassmorphism: bg-white/80 dark:bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-2xl rounded-xl

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers, toasts, and the AI Assistant panel.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px subtle borders (border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800) to define structure instead of heavy shadows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture to the background if possible to reduce digital flatness.

motion.hover_effects: Lift up (-translate-y-1) for cards. Glow effect for AI buttons.

landing_hero.usage: Hero section background or side image

empty_states.usage: Use for 'No Notes Found' or 'Empty Folder' states. Apply a grayscale filter if needed to match the theme.

avatars.usage: User profile placeholder or Team section.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Avoid light gray text on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and JetBrains Mono to the project (via Google Fonts or Fontsource).
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Soft Utility' color palette defined above.
3. BUILD LAYOUTS: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Do not make it a generic list.
4. AI INTEGRATION: Design the 'Ask AI' feature as a floating panel or a distinct sidebar with a 'Glassmorphism' effect.
5. EMPTY STATES: Use the provided abstract 3D images for empty states to add visual interest.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays.
